column2:
Gathering talent that's leaving DigitalOcean and searching for new roles.

Sharks can optionally use the form at do.co/sharks-form to self-submit their information.  

Submissions go into a list at do.co/sharks, which is public to the Internet.  It is intended to be used by recruiters to find talented people that are searching for new opportunities post-DigitalOcean.

Please consider using your social and professional networks to amplify visibility of this resource to aid talented, impacted Ex-Sharks.  Thanks!  ðŸ’™
